name: The Souls Window
description: The Universe says...  Allow me to flow through you unrestricted and you will see the greatest magic you have ever seen. Though nature is in constant movement, it is also the place to find great stillness. You find who you are, your source, in the stillness of the present moment with nature moving through you. While you do not need to go anywhere or do anything to find this since it is inside of you, nature serves to quiet the mind, open a window to the soul and reveal you to you.
